parameter.title: Initial Date
parameter.abstract: Initial date of the temporal interval of interest with the format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ]

parameter.title: Final Date
parameter.abstract: Final date of the temporal interval of interest with the format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ]

workflow.title: ETHZ-03-03-01 - Earthquake detection using social media
workflow.abstract: This application takes Twitter to generate a heatmap for earthquake detection
